entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person who has a magical eye that can whizz over the map. He is alarmed and interested in something on the map.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is a person who is being questioned by Moody about Crouch's whereabouts.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person whose absence has alarmed Moody and Potter.

relationships.description: Moody asks Potter if he is sure that Crouch is not there.
Moody is concerned about the absence of Crouch and finds it interesting.
